notes.title: Session 0
notes.text:
Jonah Nibblebits - the goblin quest broker.

The PigNMilk  was the meeting spot bar, in Kessen (The capital).

Bard(Joe) first to arrive. Tarryn is his name.

Otto(Luke) second to arrive, Ogre.

I then enter, radiantly.

Followed by Mozzi(Charlie), mongrelfolk, 5ft, with a mechanical rat wtf

Finally, Nym (Phil’s character).

Mozzi - Light green skin, mottled pale white like scarred. Just over 5ft tall, out of one side of the head is a horn. Sharp chin, large bulbous nose. Large hands. Short human in stature.

Large tattered leather coat, brim around the face. Under the coat looks like a very worn fancy garment, plain trousers hide boots. Seems to be hunched over. He tries to hide it, but obviously under the coat he has 2 more arms that are crossed behind his back. Mozzi has a pet mechanical rat named Lodo.

Nym - Very pointy angular features, red and purple eyes. Dark black skin, slicked back short white hair. Finely made clothes, black/purple midnight coat. Dark blues and grey for the rest of the clothes. Small scar on the left side of his face. On his belt, a skull like mask, one side gold and one side silver, one side smiling one side grimacing.

Otto - Half ogre, yellowish brown skin, two small lower tusks, soft brown eyes. Dark hair. Naturally a big boi. Just under 8ft, just under 400lbs. Interestingly, wearing fine looking clothing. A large signet ring on a necklace around his neck.

Tarryn - Tall and spindly, hidden by many many coats in a technicolour fashion. Massive hat, with a fucking huge feather coming out of it. Long red hair in a pony tail. Pretty boi. Massive lute around his back. His backpack wheezes as he drops it.

Quest!

Explorers from the explorers guild have gone missing trying to search through an elven tomb. There were 3 from the explorers guild, and 3 hired adventurers. They haven’t come back and we’re being hired to bring back their tags, if not bring them back alive.

He gives us a map, pointing west. We’re heading to Baergaden.

Explorer’s guild members who went missing:

Pilana Halfbeat - Halfling

Kudan Mundan - Orc

Philak Greydak - Dwarf

3000 gp each for a reward. 5% goes to Jonah.

6 days travel.

On the 14th day Jonah will meet us back at the PigNMilk.

Mozzi explains that he has guns! Crazy

We take the map he’s given us.

We head to the Big Leak tavern, a local dive bar.

Travelling west we will go through a town called Vraddak. It’s a town with a bridge in it for going over the river. Anlak is the Mayor. Pridemount family kind of own it. Sounds shady.

We sleep in the Big Leak, and wake up the next day, eat breakfast, and pick up some rations for the journey. And we head out on the open road!!!

During the first night, in Nym’s middle watch, around 8 dark figures approached the camp but not directly looking. They passed by but may be something. They were definitely trying to be hidden.

Mine and Mozzi’s watch passed uneventfully.

We travel on for 5 days and eventually approach a river with a bridge, leading directly into the town of Vraddak. Vraddak appears walled and gated.

The first inn we find is the Cobblers House, and we enter.

The party we’re looking for definitely passed through this town, and even this bar.

Tarryn gathers some serious information in the town about the explorer’s guild party.

After 6 days of travel we eventually reach our destination. Their camp is now ruined, hard to tell exactly what tore it down whether its nature or animals.

We start descending down into the tomb!

We come across 7 bodies eventually. 3 of the individuals were are looking for, 4 of them are elves but not desiccated, look like they may be wild elves.

As we investigate they rise!

Turns out turn undead is really cool.

Combat ends soon after!

SESSION END!!

notes.title: Traska Summarized
notes.text:
Traska Summarized: 


Damus - First Emperor of Traska, brought prosperity from uniting the races.

Damus forms a council to rule the empire, which eventually overthrows his bloodline.

Traska now ruled by a large Magocracy.

High Archmage is the ruler, 30 elected mage council members, elected from sources of intelligence throughout the realm. One more is chosen to be voice of the high archmage, making 31 members + high archmage.

Relative peace across the realm. Big divide between upper and lower class. No free schooling so rich get richer.


Civilized law mostly, death penalty exists for most dangerous individuals.


Most cities have the Mage Guard, guards policing and investigation. Most council members spend a few years in Mage Guard, to then rise up.


Most crimes go to court. Jury duty full time job.


Towns/Villages differ, most have a mayor chosen by the regions capital. The mayors word is law in these smaller settlements.


Quest Brokers - work individually dealing with problems that Mage Guard don't have time to investigate. Some are illigitimate.




Orgs and Guilds


Mage Guard - Read above

Air Guild - All Things Airships. Run on purple crystals from underdark?

Commerce Guild - Bankers and Investors. Sometimes divination to predict the future stonks

Inquisition - aka Internal Affairs/Watchmen. They check yoself before you wreck yo self if you mage bad things

Smiths Guild - Arms dealers. Mostly from Baergaden Province. Stronk

Assasins Guild - Who are they? Nobody knows

Noble Masons - Like Scientology maybe, except they're descendants of the old Emperor.

Criminal Empires - We <3 Crime and Mafia

Wild Elf Conclave - Treehugers anonymous. Don't fuck with their trees. 


Threats to the East!? o_0


Ok so to the east is another continent with a weird name and weirder creatures.

Iguadelv (IG WA DELVE) is Rexan Empire + Kingdom of Throns.

Rexan Empire is lizardfolk who are mega stronk and love war and magic.

Kingdom of Thorrns is elf/fae and they have a forest like creep in starcraft 2. 

These guys might look our way one day if they get bored.

OH ALSO BTW THERE ARE FUCKING ROBOTS ON THAT CONTINENT TOO. The Metal Initiative, which is very Terminator 2. They hate us.



What's West?


A big jungle that's what. Maybe snake gods. They turn up to take slaves some times I'm sure its fine.



Provinces


Majoris - Home of the Capital, Kessen. All sorts of town and cities in here. Obvs a lot in Kessen which is large and in charge.


Estersea - Eastern most. They keep lots of look out for threats from the east. They're a proud and stern lot, mostly elves. Think of it like the wall from game of thrones, except the wall is the sea.


Baergaden - Western. Lots of mountains, lots of dwarves and underground dwarfy holes. Also underdark. Also sounds like Beer Garden.


Grunvak - To the north east. Pretty seclduded peoples. They don't have much to worry about militarily which gives them loads of time to become bitter and resentful about giving up land a long time ago. Get serious MAGA vibes.


Naroon - North. They get raided by the underdark a lot. It makes them very suspect of people. They also farm a lot.


Oldon - South. They defend against the Soverignty (more on them later). Lots of fighting here.


Tranquil Hills - Here we mad chillin. So much so that people hate that they mad chillin. Also there's a drug called Tranquil too, so that's cool.


Traskan Sovereignty - Ok so we've got this guy Vanick, who thinks he's the descendant of the Emperor, so they're trying to make traska great again by removing the council of mages. 


Ghost - Sounds spooky. Low population because the pesky jungle people from the west keep nicking them to be slaves. Not cool man.

notes.title: Session 1
notes.text:
We begin the session by re-introducing ourselves after the undead destruction.

Making sure that everyone is fine after the battle. Otto is slightly injured, but nothing to worry about.

We carry on down the corridor deeper in the tomb. There are tombs built into the walls in the side where there are assumed bodies. Also on the walls the elven designs and inlay get more intricate as we go further down.

The next room we enter has two sarcophagi on the left and right.
I get super spooked at this point and cast Detect Undead. It doesn't show any undead in the area so we continue. Spooky!

We're going deeper underground dun dun!

We come across another room with like 16 sarcophagi in it. Fucking bollucks blew my load too early. Just enough detect undead to not find any undead in this room.

We continue and continue, and give Mozzi a big telling off for looting, he stops.

Me and Nym are holding up the rear of the party when this big slop of meat falls on us. These skin kites tear off part of our skin and we suffer 4 points of Charisma damage. What in the actual fuck, not cool man! They try to fly off and multiply, but Otto has other plans... and kills them both with attacks of opportunity.

We enter the boss room (I hope). Its a squarish room, with 3 normal looking skeletons, and 1 maybe boss skeleton? Who knows.
There are 8 sarcophagi with who knows what the fuck is going on there. And then at the back of the room are two massive crossed swords blocking some sort of entrance? Looks dangerous.
I went for a nervous shit, because you know fear, and when I came back Otto had fucking annhiliated the room! Noice!
However he's also taking a fucking shit tonne of damage from this ghoul like creature, which eventually paralyzes him, no bueno.
Eventually the creature falls.

For a little bit, at least, until Nym accidently triggers a trap and the ghoul reforms right fucking next to me! Less than ideal!

Tarryn almost dies, but he's all fucking good for sure... no worries at all..

We take a little short rest, so Mozzi can repair guns and for a little cry.
We continue down the corridor, until we hit the definite fucking boss chamber now. Inside we see a figure:

Short form, long dark hair learning over a table. They seem to be taking pieces of undead bodies, and kind of build a bearing some sort of undead creature. Fuck my actual life.

This bitch throws a bone and then goes invisible. What the fuck is that? The bone then turns into a skeleton I guess?!?!
Tarryn reveals here with some glitter, and I charge in and blow my full load all over her face, Sun domain turn undead at max rolls. She gives 0 fucks about this situation.

It starts to look real bad. It's very bad when Otto gets pushed underground by this fucking she deamon and entombed...

The fight continues, it comes close to pain as she's summoning skeletons and shit. Eventually killed by Otto

Lord Evenor is the top tomb of this place. Tarryn recognises that this lord is old, before the time of the empire. We need to get the fuck out of here!
Although we do loot his tomb, and come across a purple gem of doom.

We run! As we leave the tomb oh fucking great we're surrounded by elves, bows drawn. 'We need to talk' the main dude says. Fuck my ass

notes.title: Session 2
notes.text:
RECAPPED! It's Bridgy fair tonite maaa88ytte.
Elves is here. The clear leader elf is long blond hair and literallly fully standard elf. Longbow in hand but not fully drawn. His pals are drawn.

Speaks in Elven to Nym. They really fucking hate Nym. Elves hate black people.
They search all of us, and Mozzi gives up the gem after kind of accidentally showing it. Again, to stress it, they FUCKING HATE Nym! Then they let us leave, thank you so much.

We make camp, before going through Vraddak. Me and Nym heal up our Charisma damage thank god, and eventually we end up back in Kessan.
WE NAME OURSELVES THE PEDIGREE CHUMS!!

We decide that we're going to celebrate with a big night out in the Big Leak tavern.

Tarryn and Otto have a drinking competition, because, you know. DnD.
We all wake up the next day in various states of hungover, and head to the hospitatlity district to the Pig N Milk to meet up with Jonah!

The most epic moment ever. Mozzi spends his epic point, to retroactively actually steal the purple gem, which he pulls out in front of Jonah. Fucking hilarious, but potentially  fucking dangerous. The gem is extremely magical, and possibly a soul gem from the underdark.

I spend my off time (a couple of months) in the temple.

Neccos Kalarys (Neck Oss)- Golden dragonborn, high priestess of Pelor. I spend a lot of time with her during the off months. One of the most powerful people in this city.
Appearance, 6andhalf feet, radiating light and warmth, Arabian accent. Meeting with her in the temple, she explains that Pelor is shining down upon me. Pelor wants me to fucking roam bitch, samesies.

She thinks that I would be best suited to be travelling around in the world, bringing Pelor's will to the needy. Also she requests to be able to call on me should the need arise.

WE LEVEL UP TO OUR NEXT CHARACTERS HERE!!

Hired by Stefan Gallows via Jonah, part of the neighbourhood watch of Kremix. Hired because 3 dissapearances in this tiny village, and agreed to meet him in the Bugbear's Delight tavern. Northwest of Kessan, 4 days or so walk. Close to the river. People appear to hate us in this town for some reason. 5000gp per person!

We meet up with a grey haired, scragily loooking Stefan. Brown glove with silver studs on the knuckles? He says since 12 days ago, 4 people have gone missing. Upgraded from 3.

- Tamlyn Dock, human 40 something, long dark hair quite gaunt looking. Farmer. Left the tavern one evening 12 days ago, never seen again! NorthWest on a farm I assume.

- Levena Draska, Elf traveller. She stayed in a different pub Farm Hands Rest. But she never arrived at that tavern. Found her cloak and staff. Dissapeared at night

- Kravena Kragstilt - Dwarf. Returning from farmlot. Farmus Bodge last saw her, left late in the dark. 6 days ago. Also at night A FUCKING PATTERN

- Drizza Kalop - Half Elf. Left this inn late 2 days ago. He was about 50.

The Mayor of this town doesn't like adventures. Idiot. Town guard of which there are like 10-12, don't really like us either appaz.
So we make a plan(?) to try and find out more information about these dissapearances.

Me Nym and Otto attempt to go the market to buy/distract. One of the guards stops us and doesn't like us at all! Tells us to not cause trouble. We head to a farm to get more information / bless crops.

Tarryn gets questioned too. Somehow goes from bad to good! Mozzi hiding the whole time.

Mozzi finds some shit near where Levana's stuff was found. Taking his time he starts to find some tracks, even through the cobblestone. It all leads to a fucking well. Of course it fucking does. Fuck you. Also nearby there are some steps going down to a sealed iron gate.

We have a run in with a fucking yokel farmer. Who after much shit talk, eventually find out that potentially some kind of crazy giant spider. Oh joy. Massive spider potentially bigger than Otto. 

A long time later! We make a plan to kill this spooky spider in the well. Its gonna be gross

notes.title: Session 3
notes.text:
Scary times!! Begin by doing the watch, looking at the well. Waiting and hoping that nothing comes out of the well.
So we all do our watches and we smell some stank, and hear some weird popping noises from coming down the well?

Apart from that nothing major... hopefully...
We decide fuck it yolo and we're going to try get through the gate somehow. Me and Tarryn go to speak to the head of the guard, who is a large orc fella. Some talking ensues, and we go to visit the Mayor at his house!

Mayor is a gnome, Gildrek Loken. Sat in a chair way to big for him. He might not like us. Motherfucking monocle.
I'm still fucking confused as to why they hate us. They hate us cos they aint us

We signed a document saying we wont cause a ruckus. Also the mayor is just a straight up asshole and definitely is probably 100% evil for sure maybe.

We open the gate eventually, and we start the sewer dungeon crawl. Mozzy tries to speak to a rat. It doesn't go well. Also it smells a lot like rotting flesh down here.

We end up in an open cavern, fighting some carion crawlers, and some other doggy like underdark beasties. It's getting pretty gross down here, especially when Otto gets fucking paralyzed!
Why is underdark beasties here? We ain't nowhere near it. Its bad juju

Carrying on, we enter what looks to be the big boss cavern... Uh oh!

notes.title: Session 4
notes.text:
It begins... Don't cry...

Ok we start of the combat in the cavern under the well. Mozzi gets picked up by this crazy spider creature because we ended with him next to it. Not ideal.
Also Nym and Otto start popping the weird spore things, which look gross.

I'm so fucking god damn slow in this cavern and everyone is fucking dyyyiiinnngggggg!

OTTO THE FUCKING MAN! Takes over a grapple he's in, and then fucking Hulk vs Loki's him around the room.
Although Otta and Mozzi go down which gets a little spicy but we all survive.

The Cussy (Cave pussy) goes down into the underdark apparently!? Which is super fucked up because it shouldn't be here.
The bodies are all here and very dead. Tarryn starts writing a note explaining this shit situation to the Goblin mayor.

So eventually we leave and head back to Kessen! Much gold get, Drinks are had, Prayers to Pelor are completed.
The rest of the chums go shopping while I pray and shit. They meet Get Aetris, at the Enchanting Enchanter store where they get lots and lots of upgrade. Oh and like a month and a half passes while we do minor stuff and dat.

My adventure! I go to the shop the 'Healing Wave' to buy my wand of cure mod wounds. The shopkeeper is a female with blue tinted skin, white eyes, long white braided hair over a shoulder. Tall woman. I've never seen this type of creature before (Meta: It's a water genasi). She closes the book she's reading, and I see she has webbed fingers. Ardor Crisp.
I buy the wand, but before I leave I check her for a religious symbol and she used to wear a ring dedicated to Ehlonna, goddess of Forests, Woodlands, Flora, Fauna, and Fertility.
We all head then to the Above Board Under Dark shop, with the drow shopkeeper. She. Fucking. Haaaaaates. Me! I buy my shit and run out before I cause a domestic.

More time passes, we chillin. At one point we get teamed up with the Mage Guard, who no one seems to fucking like. We start becoming heroes up in dis bish.
Jonah messages Nym mentally that he's been kidnapped! We need to go to Vraddak to get him. He also says there's a big bonus!!

We try to get Get to teleport us, but it's gonna cost way too much and we'd have to do trips. Sounds fucking stupid, so we buy a horse and carriage. Nym goes and buys some spells scrolls from Ardor at the Healing Wave.

We start out travels! AND WE GET TO THE END OF THE FLASHBACK SAT AROUND THE CAMPFIRE!!

We enter Vraddak, and saddle our carriage. We head to the pub in Vraddak that we've been to before. Inside we see a woman who sort of looks like a pirate. Hey, she has a gun! Also a white eye in on her coat. She's part of the fucking inquisition! Oh shiiiiiitt

notes.title: Session 5
notes.text:
Recap and we're in Vraddak! In the Cobbler's House, fucking Inquistor! Terrified.

Dalah is the barmaid/owner of this inn we're in. We remember her being farily friendly from before. We go the bar, and sort out food, drink, rooms and stabling.
I walk up to the Watchmen Lydia Greymont and introduce myself, she seems nice. Tarryn dislikes this decision, but him and Nym come and sit down next to me!
Tarryn plays some reeeall crazy word chess with this woman, where basically she says, she can't do any thing official but knows of some things maybe going down in this town. So it would be nice if we could do something.
She's a well known watchman/inquisitor, for taking down a corrupt councillor in the past.

She fucking knows we stole the elf soul gem. Fuck my ass.
Eventually she goes to bed, she's got early travels in the morning.

Also, it appears that the elves that we stole the soul gem from are SUPER PISSED OFF ABOUT THAT and want it back...

I go to bed after trying a sending spell to Jonah again, but it fails.
Nym goes off to 'enjoy the night life'... which is ominous.
Mozzi goes off into the night and then start speaking to rats in the street. Which actually works! Find out that Jonah was beaten and dragged off days again by 5 hooded men, but unsure where.
Nym did an explore but got followed around by the guards.


Anlak Pridemount - Leader of the Pridemount crime family who run and own this town. He is the Mayor, everyone in the town hates him. He's known as a very bad man. The guards are definitely under his control.

I have a dream! What the fuck! It's a red moon blocking out the sun. An object twice my height and width, framed in the sun is in front of me. Possibly an eye?! Big blood moon eclipse... I'm in a strange town I don't recognise. NOT COOL MAN! Fucking visions and shit.

Nym is the first awake, cos elf. A woman enters the bar in distress. Her son vinny, is very ill apparently. Fatigued, and now mute?

We go and visit this kid, very thin, haggard. Generally not good. Nym detects a magic aura around the child with no specific magic school. We judge that he might live for another 4-5 days, but it's not looking good.
I try a lesser restoration. Doesn't do a lot but maybe cures some of his fatigue.
I then use sending, to try and communicate with this child.

'Can't sleep, someone watching, nightmare's too real and too scary. I dont want to sleep, something is out to get me. Please help' is the reply... Fuck...

We do try and detect if there is something invisible in the room with us but there is nothing there.

Explain to Charlotte, the mother, that we've done all that we can for the moment. And we start heading to the temple of Pelor. It's quiet... too quiet...

Then two shadowy hooded figures come out and block our way... Its combat time!!
Call an ambulance! Call an ambulance!!! But not for me!
We literally slaughter them in seconds. It's fucking hilarious. They picked the wrong house fool.
We loot: Magic leather, wand of something, 1000gp, A potion of who knows, a scroll, thug jewellery stash.
Scroll is a tri cast spell: Locate creature, Illusory Terrain, Dimensional Anchor.
Armour is +2 leather
Wand of Melfs acid arrow with 16 charges.

We end the session, surrounding a freshly woken up human bandit man which are we going to question... violently?

notes.title: Session 6
notes.text:
My notes dissapeared. Fuck... So brief recap of first hour.

We ask questions to the guy who was sleeping. He doesn't know a lot of interesting shit, but he does tell us that apparently there is another group of dodgy robed men, and they're the one who kidnapped Jonah.
We also find out that the major guy appaz worships an evil Deity named: Hextor.
I also cast speak with dead on the other dead guy who was murdered before we got there. He really knows fuck all, except the only good thing we get out of him is that they dont know why Vinny is ill/sick

We visit the temple. Meet Father Arven. Half-Elven. We ask him about healing Vinny. The father calls the group 'The Peddlers'.

Our only other lead is someone at the temple of Boccob who is investigating what ails young Vinny. We meet Priest Oleryn, who is a pretty old Pai Mei looking motherfucker. He gives us a scroll of See Invisibility which lets us look into the ethereal plane!! Potential saviour for the boy!

On our way back to move Vinny to the temple of pelor for safety, one of the guard, the actual guard, approaches us. The mayor wants to meet us in his office! This should be fun... We say we will but we're gonna move the boy first.

Then... we fucking do it... we head to the mayors office...We're let in.

We come to the mayor. Plated dwarven guy with a mean stare. Flanked by two other guys in full plate and shields. They seem to be overly geared. Like they're ready for war. Way over the money value expected. Large grand room.

He wants us to kill someone big who's been fucking with his men. Killing him. Likely the big motherfucker who killed the other guy, from the end of last session. It's all getting a bit hostile in here...... He also says: 'Get that beak bastard out of here...' What the fuck is the beak about!? We left on a very tense note and head to back to the temple of Pelor.

Tarryn goes out to investigate and gather some information. Comes back with info about this 'big guy' who's deffo a vigilante who is attacking the mayors men. Tall, broad, similar to Otto in size. Except its some kind of monster, some people say it flys from rooftop to rooftop, or skulking in alleyways with red eyes. Loves to SMASH FACES IN FUCK YEAH. No one has survived contact with this individual, and no one has spoke to him.

Info on kidnapping: Few over the past few years. Info by word of mouth, no one seems to have seen it happen in action. Very hush hush and mysterious. Seems to be always people who are visiting from outside of town. Beaked Individual? Some people have seen a beaked figure, once in a blue moon. A lot of the dissapearences happen just after his spotting. Long brownish hair description, with a plague doctor style mask. Plain robes. No one has really spoken to him, but has grey cold eyes appaz...

Fuck...

Back in to real life... we rest... staying up casting detect magic to try and see the strange spirit. IT FUCKING HAPPENS. BIG SCARY AURA AROUND THE YOUNGUN.

Nym casts See invisibility from the scroll that was given to us and its gross. This ethereal figure bent over the boy, this ethereal energy being pulled from the boy into this strange female creature. As Nym calls out the figure looks out towards him. Nym recognises the creature as a Night Hag.
Night Hag information: Have the ability to travel the ethereal plane. Known for attacking people in their sleep, draining their constitution. Take the form of humanoids, live nearby, take on forms of females or young children. To find the Night Hag in the material plane, should be nearby with no animals nearby, and a foul smell around.
If we take her heartstone then she can't go etheral and also its worth a pretty penny.

Mozzi and Nym go out to ask the rats where they would never go to try and find the night hags position. Potentially near the docks.
They also then ask questions about the big vigilante thing. PSYCH its literally fucking right behind them. Potentailly a gargoyle. Fucking terrifiying

notes.title: Session 7
notes.text:
We start in the pot, but not really...

Hag has resistance to Fire, Cold, Charm and Sleep

We make our way hastily to the docks, trying to find the hags house. We do some searching at night and eventually come across the definite house. A little old lady answers who may be a slave who knows.
Otto doesn't enjoy having the door slammed in his face. So he makes a new one.

The hag seems to have transformed into the fucking ring girl. Fuck you.

Combat starts big time!! Also some crazy demon things fly out of the furniture!
We name this bitch Hagatha Whispy.

God this fight is fucking intese. She has a lot of damage reduction and spell resistance. Also Otto has taken 20 strength damage so it's getting pretty dicey. We're going deeeeeeep in this fight.

We fucking did it! That fight was hard as nails!!

notes.title: Session 8
notes.text:
Heartstone aqquired. Tarryn goes to check on the other old lady.
The rest of us make our way slowly back to the temple of Pelor.

Half way to the temple, a gargoyle drops down behind us. He's large even by gargoyle standards. PEBS! Is his name! He might be stupid...

Arriving at the temple, I immediately go to Vinny, and let him know he can finally rest. We should Pebs that we're good guys, and fuck the mayor. I reassure Father Arven that we're all good, and Pebs is fine too. However Arven hates Pebs because he really fucks people up all the time. We diplomatically talk about maybe killing the mayor.

Pebs also knows roughly where Jonah is, River to the north, however not exactly where.
WE FINALLY REST THANK GOD, and me and Arven manage to heal Otto to full! Even with the disgusting demonic disease he gained with the Hag's bite.

We head to the market to try and get some information about any boats/barges that go north? Nobody know what the fuck we're on about. Tarryn goes to the dock for more info disguised. Still no info. Although they think we killed the old lady, so we're wanted men now.

We eventually all end up back in the Cobblers House, drinking and being merry all good...

Uhhhhh. We're fucking surrounded...

COMBAT BEGINS

Oh God fireball... Holy shit.
OH GOD PEBS IS HERE AND FUCKING SHIT UP

I almost die... cry...
But we succeed. With 3 guard surrendered, and the mayor super dedge.

notes.title: Session 9
notes.text:
Welcome back!!
We let the surrendererers leave, they don't know anything and we leave them cards on the way out. We loot EVERYTHING.

We take the mayors body, and walk through town to go to his office. Some guards attempt to stop us but run quite quickly after they realize that the mayor is dedge.

In the office Nym finds a secret passageway behind a bookcase because of course. We leave the mayors body in here, and head down the very small passageway.

We find his unholy Hextor altar room. 3 Musketeers enter to do some seraching and BANG fireball destroys everything.

Otto has written a message on the door about respect. Nym and Otto take off to his house to try and search it. Tarryn and I stay behind to hopefully deliver a god tier speech. Tarryn delivers the greatest speech of all time to try and get the crowd. The crowd is shit.

Nothing good in the house.

I try to send to Lydia Greymont the inquisitor and she doesn't exist? What in the name of actual fuck?! Confusion.

We research the mayors office, and his actual bedroom is in the office! Mozzi finds a tiny little notch, inside is a little will? It's a horrible note about potions and power and evil.

All the identifying is done. Lots of cool magic shit. A scary potion that is a healing potion + other bits. Not sure bit spooky times.

Me and Mozzi stay behind in the mayors office because I'm spooked about the evil room.

The other boys get a scry on Jonah and find him in a cage, and badly beaten. Also the Cobblers House if fucking lively tonight!!

I go to the temple of Pelor, and father Arven agrees to consecrate the shrine for me! Result. Vinny is doing well too. Tomorrow we ride! But tonight we party!

notes.title: Session 10
notes.text:
WHAMAGEDDON

We arrive at a shady house where Jonah may be? Who knows. There's a fucking boat. I thought boats were banned.
GET THE DIVINE VIGOR FEAT!!

Ok so we start trying to sneak up to the building and fucking IMMEDIATE lightning bolt comes out? What the actual fuck.
Combat begins. Me and Tarryn completely fuck it up with the card and end up face down in the dirt. Haste is fun. Fast as fuck boi.

It start's getting dicey. Otto takes 4 negative levels!?!?!?! What the fuck is that shit. He also might die... The sun must come!!
Thank fuck for haste. I get there fast as we almost lose Nym and Otto and manage to heal them. Eventually we manage to coral them into the building and we do kill them all! And we find Jonah in the cage unconcious.

Looting all the stuff! And retrieving the cart!! And finding all the strange potions.
After speaking with the dead bard with speak with dead, this appears to be an older group of adventurers that Jonah has shunned in the past?

The boss is the beaky man!! Who the fuck is the beaky man!!

notes.title: Session 11
notes.text:
So. There's a door. Do not disturb :)

We disturb.

It's a fucking door full of undead creatures, answered by a Lich. Fucking my big black ass.

Actually there's a mistress here? Lich has a boss? Named Ildi Sunfire. She looks like me a bit...

Me and Nym were kind of hiding at the back behind a tree, until a group of skeletons come out and do some dance routine with her? Yeah nah yeah nah.

We seriously get the fuck out of there!

Carrying on down the road some more we run in to the ACTUAL FUCKING LYDIA GREYMONT. She is a no bullshit kind of person. We tell her basically everything. Seems like she's on the trail of her impersonator... This might come back to bite us in the ass one day...

Side quest? Lederna has lost her husband Richard? They're heading to Kessen, but he got lead away into the forest? or away?

I lost some notes :(.
Basically we go searching for Richard, we find some Will o Wisps, and we kill them even with their crazy high AC.

Then we keep going forward through the forest and there's a campfire that Tarryn investigates. SYKE FUCKING TERRIBLE IDEA. He starts running back to us because it's bad juju.
This big fucking creature and some smaller boys come at us.
THE COOLEST KILL EVER. Double mace to the face.

notes.title: Session 12
notes.text:
Fresh off the megakill...

We head around the lake, as there is a boat on the other side, and potentially Richard is over there?
Takes a couple hours to get around it, we start to see the smoke of camp fires.

We find a kind of trogladyte camp, with a few camp fires and tents. Also Richard is there! Tied to a tree and pretty badly beaten.

At first we try to have a little bit of diplomacy with the trogladytes, but they're pretty much not into that so FIREBALL IT IS!!

Combat is going pretty well until big boss arrives! It's a snake with a lady face. Gross! Also it possesses Mozzi, and tells him that he reeeaaalllllyyy wants to shoot Nym in the face. So he tries! Also the snake lady can fucking fireball people too so that sucks cock and dick and balls.

Either way, we fucking kill everyone here including the snake lady and save Richard! All is good in the world right? right?

WRONG!

There's a barrow? cave? thing that looks pretty spooky. Its kind of maybe dug into, and then its pretty spooky corridor with unknown writing. It's fucking spooky? Some sort of fiery gate murial? I'm glad I'm not down there is all I know. The more stealthy of us see some reaaaaal shit.

Anyway... EMERGENCY! The fucking lady of the lake is here... Actually she's not bad? Question mark? She kidnapped Richard, to bring someone here to deal with the naga + trogladytes? Questionable decision but that's fine. We're trying to decide whether we're coming back to investiagte this, but regardless we get Richard back to his wife! Quest complete!!!

WHY THE FUCK DID WE GO BACK! So as I read the text with spells now, First it says there's a God buried here? None that we know of. After the mural it starts speaking about calamity and betrayal? Nym walks under the pheonix gate and feels a little warm.

We enter into the worst room ever... Fuck

notes.title: Session 13
notes.text:
FUUUUUCCKKKKKKK. I got smacked out turn one for 26 damage. That hurt.

It goes as bad as it possibly could. A wall of fire in the corridor we're in fucks everything. Lodo almost dies, Tarryn almost dies. Nym almost dies. Eventually they kind of just let us live!?
The flame portal at the back of the room kind of changes into a more stary space instead.

We enter into a temple? A bird temple?

Infernia - Goddess of fire. Forogtten temple. Within this stone is some of my power. Calamity is near. She will bestow power to whoever passes her test! And then a feather slowly falls down onto an egg and bazinga. It turns into a fucking pheonix and the test begins! Fuck my ass.

We defeat the pheonix bird god lady, and a blessing can be given to someone. Otto takes it on! He gets a really cool piece of parchement, with some secret powers on it? Seeeeccreeeetttss. We take a little rest in the previous pre portal chamber.

WE LEVEL UP
END OF ACT 1

After many days of travel, we arrive back in Kessen!! and we go off to find Jonah in the Pig n Milk. We do a lot of talking with Jonah, and food and drinks are had! And then we get our 10000 gold!! Also Jonah is gonna sell some more stuff, and we're gonna get 16000gp additional after he sells stuff in 2 days.

We do some drinking in the Big Leak. It gets fucking twisted. We head back to the Pig N milk eventually. Jonah is all kinds of fucked up. He reveals he used to be in the Mageocracy, for 2 years as the shortest serving member. Some of his memories have been removed by them. That's fucked up.

I wake up first, because obviously. Its a bad idea. I get stopped by Captain Lightpass, of the Mage guard, surrounded by a couple more of the guards. They're hear to round us up. We have a conversation to have with a representitive of the elven conclave...
Off to the governmental tower we go! This gon' be bad.

Llorofin Venora, the Archmage of foreign affairs, 'greets' us.

Helafin Sunriver, conclave elf representitive. Moon motifs. Galadriel lite.

We sort of get out of that situation unscathed? Nice?...
Until we get outside.........
What the actual fuck there's some people singing, and then BOOM an explosion out of the Miltiary Tower. What the fuck is going on... Session End.

notes.title: Session 14
notes.text:
What did Tarryn do!?

We run, to the explosion of the military tower. Through the mile long tunnel until we hit the crowd of people. I manage to push the party through, into the carnage, and try and save/heal as many people as possible. Then suddenly a fucking terrorist fireball explosion happens and kills fucking a billion civilians. What the actual fuck

We leave, silently and solumly. We make our way to somewhere quiet to chat. We find a private room in Kiplings (The Inn) to discuss. It costs a fortune.

Tarryn wrote the song of the Democratic Liberartion Front, its a movement that believes that Traska should be run by a democracy instead of a mageocracy.

In the past a big gathering of 50k people, stormed the political tower and arranged a sit in. No violence, until there was. 1000's died on both side. Saw the death of Evelios Gallernoble, an elf whos wife Vola Brokenfang Orc lived and basically starts going crazy trying to get revenge. Radical Turn. Since Volo has run it, acts of terrorism has gone up and targetting anyone if they can fuck with the mageocracy.

Vola eventually arrested and taken to prison... Is she out now? Its on? 12 years or so timeline.

This is all kind of fucked up..
We take our rest in our private room. Lodo gets repaired!!! Also... ratmen? skaven? bad news.

I teach Tarryn some celestial through the day.

Next Day! Shopping adventure. I finally get boots of striding and sprinting! I can fucking moooooovvee. Apparently necklace of fireballs are gonna be banned soon. Also in the attack maybe some potions were used? Emergency?!

The Water Genasi woman, Ardor Crisp is trying to replicate the potions... Maybe I'll give her one one day...
We also all get rings of communication!!

We buy stabling for the horse and cart for the year. WE BUY A FUCKING FLAT! Lets go. 32nd floor of Halfbreed Heights. The flat is called The Pedigree Pad.

We meet Jonah in the Pig N Milk, and he confirms that actually way more fucking mage guard got murdered, as the terrorist acts happenend in every tunnel connected to the military district. Also confirmed Vola is out!

We try to figure out what to do with the potions that are super fucking hot right now, as they were used in the attacks.

Eventually, we make the diplomatic decision to hand the hot potions to the Mageocracy... Which I have to now figure out next time on dragonball Z

notes.title: Session 15
notes.text:
Anyway session!

I speak to the captain of the Mageguard, Captain Lightpass the angry dwarf bloke, and explain that we found some of the potions previous. No lies, and eventually he gets all the potions, promising to hand some over to Ardor Crisp.

The other boys went to library to be nerds, and Mozzi stays behind to put a catapult on Lodo? maybe?

They look up some shit on Infernia, I think I wasn't paying attention.
I go too. I'm trying to look for shit on the vision I had in Vraddak fucking ages ago.

All sorts of information is found by the others.

Infernia is big even by pheonix standards. There was a poem found about that too. From the Tragedy of the Elementals, Power of the Flame. Something about an egg not hatching.

For me: No deities really cover the moon or blood moon. Speicifically, there is no god of the moon?

The plane of Akaron? A plane of eternal night, where armies clash under a blood moon. Grummush, Ouijas are from this plane.`

Description: Ignorant armies clash by night, refuse plane of a million failed rebellions. Enforce order, and conformity better than good.

Calamity incoming? every 33 years, there's an eclipse, and maybe some sort of calamity is coming... Not cool.

We go to sleep in our home for the first time. LIVE LAUGH LOVE

NOT. We get fucking attacked in our house by fucking rat men! They're trying to grab Lodo!? Not cool. Also Tarryn got completely fucking fucked, stabbed in bed.

We find a note on a dead rat that the other bitch rats killed:

"Great maker, be warned, my kin come for you. Terrym want your weapons and craft to turn on the surface dwellers. We will assist where we can. Lord Snibble"

Tarryn has a permanent neck scar now. Chicks love it

Next week, we do a rat interrogation.

notes.title: Session 16
notes.text:
FUCKING RATS.

Ok so we have this fucking rat man tied up and we begin some interrogation shit. It goes extremely poorly lol.

Tarryn and Nym go and find the law, they succeed! Probably a bit too successful, the fuzz are coming fast and we've done some light torture. We knock the rat out so they shut the fuck up.

The fuzz turn up. They've never seen the ratmen either.

Eventually other people turn up. Captain fucking Lightpass once again. Female Goliath turns up. Tall as shit. Large warhammer, Armoured to the tits. Nasal helm. Lord Captain Gagia Thundereye Elanigon. She's a no nonsense kind of biatch.

I cast Divination, to find out if the ratmen might attack us within a week. Response: 'They live in darkness, but that's not he darkness you must fear' Ominous.

Time for some downtime!

Mozzi gets to his workshop and takes care of covering up that shit. Done!

Nym: Goes to the Above Board, Under Dark to do some shopping and that. Darrrrkk shit.

Neccos Kalarys - Golden Dragonborn - High Priestess of Pelor

Ardor Crisp, did get the potions and has been studiying. Blue = magic boost, Red = martial skill, Green = skill. We leave her to her learning, but this is deffo coming back to bite us at some point.

Glaruid Brightgut - Manager of the Big Leak - Dwarf Woman.

Me and Tarryn go to the Temple of Pelor! Finally!! I speed to the high priestess about all things visions and omens. She seems very upset and annoyed about the fact that we met a God not from the Pantheon. Tarryn's wound is unfortunately not able to be recovered, and will live forever as a reminder of almost death. Me and Tarryn have a DMC.

Few days pass.

Early in the morning of one these days I recieve a message: "This is Father Arven from Vraddak. Beak returned. Fought pebs. Pebs okay. Lost arm. Beak fled."

And another one!: "Inquisitor has leads. Will be contacting you soon. Pebs is okay. He will be coming to Kessen soon."

Jonah pays us! 16000 gp!!!!

The next day, who's at the door. Inquistor Lydia fucking Greymont, that's who. Fuck nuggets. She needs us because we're fucking low profile. It's us because she thinks this might be mageocracy/mage guard involved with beaky motherfucker.

I think our plan, is to fucking Halo jump off an airship over Vraddak? Please let this happen. It's fucking haaaaappppeeeeennniiiiinnnnnngggggggggggggg

notes.title: Session 17
notes.text:
We're on a boat motherfucker.
Captain Lance Mathias is the owner of the Emerald Dragon Airship! Yes then!

He introduces us to his wife Petrya, who's an elven woman with 1 arm. Between them they use one of the crazy purple gems to fly the ship. Wild.

When we go to our rooms, we have a care package? Assuming it's from Lydia? It's like a inquisition care package.

We discuss the underdark and its shit at length.

I get a vision at night. The sun eclipsed again with a red hue. Like the same blood moon again. There's something in front of me. Taking more shape than it did before. Humanoid. Stone like appearance. Cold to the touch. Male voice. 'By his grace, free me, help me'. I spend a few hours on the top of the ship trying to think it out. Much confusion.

Tarryn has a vision too! Holy shit.

There is a grand temple of Pelor! In the northern parts of the Olden Province. Can't wait to fucking go there!

We sleep again! Otto gets a fucking vision this time!!!! Vissssiiioonnnzzzzzzz

WHY IS THERE A LORD OF CHANGE ON THE FUCKING BOARD PLEASE!?!

Otto's mum thing is a cat man? Be ba ba bada bo.

It's my turn next time. Do I searing light?! or die I heallll

notes.title: Session 18
notes.text:
DAAAAAAANNNNNGGGGEEEERRRR ISSS UPPOONNN USSSSS

That fight was fucking completely nuts, with people flying off the ship, lots of flying.

The demons, the Vrock eventually fall, with Tarryn and Otto narowly escaping death.

The Rakshasa creature lived, by diving over the boat...

Lydia has some questions and interogations for Otto.

A few days pass. Some people do some shit it is what it is.

I get another fucking vision for fuck sake. A muscular man is more visible in this vision. Greyness to their form. Shoulder length way hair. Its still a blury kind of image.

Tracing a sunlike sigil on the statues chest. 'By his will release me'. Appears to be in some sort of stone room? or surrounded with stone buildings? I'm not sure what to make of this shit.

Anyway we FUCKING HALO JUMP. AND IT WORKS TOO!

We continue to fly for a bit, and follow the river north, passing over a smaller boy and his dad probably.

Its an additional 3 days of walking to the western side of Vraddak.

Lydia casts her spell and does the look back through time thing. It goes wrong. She exclaims, Hes in Mawsgate!

notes.title: Session 19
notes.text:
It's been a while...

So Lydia is super passed out. Some sort of feedback from casting this divination spell? Apparently casting divination spells on powerful casters can kind of feedback and make you pass out.
Either way, we decide we need to get her out of the street. A couple of us take her to the temple of Pelor, while a couple go to the temple of Boccob, to try and see if the father mage there can possibly help?

No. They can't help. Her intelligence might be zero with no way of restoring it? Not sure what to do about dat..

We're trying to decide what our next moves are.

Pebs wakes up. Missing an arm. Sadge. He also has savage cuts on his chest. Cut with the beaky boy sword which he said drained him of power.

Beaky boy description -> Fancy looking robes. Beak mask only covering the mouth, quite long. Eyes visible, sunken eyes. No elven ears. Broad and muscular. Pebs says that he was 'off'. A description that is pretty much backed up as Tarryn goes around asking about the fight they had.

Also by the sounds of it, the beaky boy was toying with our boy Pebs before fucking him up. Then he twiddled something on his finger and teleported away. Cannot fucking wait to pry that ring of his cold dead hands.

Nym tries to go to the temple of Boccob to do some research but the library there is pretty shite. So on his stroll back he has a though that the reason Lydia is fucked is because the beak boy is a psionic being? And wait... is he using the beak mask over his mouth to HIDE FUCKING TENTICLES. FUCKING NO PLEASE.

We rest on this potentially terrible news.

In the morning the father of the temple of Boccob comes to the temple of Pelor and casts See Invisibility, to check if it's a similar situation to Vinny before. It's not.

Our decision then, is to get to Mawsgate as fast as we can. The best route we can think of is to go to Byton, and try and catch an airship to Mawsgate. We buy horses for everyone except for Otto because crushing, and he can basically travel the same speed. We buy as much rations as we need, and take off! Leaving Lydia behind in the temple of Pelor hoping she recovers at some point.

Byton!! We arrive! It appears to be really fucking chill here. Nice place, pretty relaxed because we sit on Lake Tranquil. Around 20 minutes travelling through the town we come to the literal 'Air-Port', where there's like 30 or so airships, with all sorts of carts and shit coming in and out. Major trade up in here. Also there's deffo some smuggling of Tranquil the drug going on in here. From descriptions, it's like Weed+.

We fuck off our horses because cba. Then we hire an airship for a hunny g each. Sorry Otto we took 100g off your character sheet because fairness.

Captain Vasinil Alendar, is a female drow. The ship is named Underdark and Beyond. Now I see why Nym found this one ;)

So I ask the captain about maybe getting a center room for Otto because he's heavy, and it turns out we can balance out the weight of the ship because there's a fucking TROLL ON THE SHIP.

4 days or so travel to Mawsgate, time for chillin. Nym goes and ask the captain to see if she knows anything about Psionics. They also talk about some drow shit, but I'm not there so I don't hear it. It definitely sounds fucking terrible though. Not that I'd know.

We continue on without much trouble and we arrive at Mawsgate! It's a two-tiered city, built into the side of a mountain. Part of the city is walled, and it also sprawls out past the walls.

As we descend in the airship, I notice a very specific statue as part of a well? Its the fucking statue from my dreams... Greaaaaattt...

Session END!

notes.title: Session 20
notes.text:
Mawsgate Mawsgate. Fucking statue.

Statue looks human, head bowed kind of short shaved hair.
Greek looking hoplite armour, muscular with a massive symbol of Pelor carved into the stone chest.

Tarryn, knows this statues to be Helio, and old champion of Pelor. The story of Helio: Legend says that he still lives, and that he was turned to stone by Medusa. Allegedly he severed her arm, but at that point he was beginning to turn to stone. Tarryn has a song about it that he sings.

After the song has finished a old looking noble man behind us starts clapping at the song. Rista Noble is his name, he is a travelling historian man? He recommends us a tavern called the Ale of the Banshee.

He also gives some more info about the statue that he knows of. He thinks that Medusa is still alive. Rumour has it that she resides in the city of Sardus, wherever that is. Maybe embedded in the mountain? Around 45 miles south ish?

The temple of Pelor here is called the Sun Sanctuary, and I'm erect.

There's also a Magic Academy. Pog

I do a wade through the fountain, and go to touch the statue. Big fucking mistake I get a Gandalf vs Ring flash vision of the same thing I saw before and the statue asking to release it. Not cool bro.

Annyyywayy, bigger fish to fry right now! Beaky boi! We head on over toward the Ale of the Banshee, which is inside the walled city bit, in the trade district. We approach the gate of the walled area, which is heavily guarded, but they're only really looking at the carts going in and out.

This is our kind of inn baby! Rowdy, lots of other people and blue collars etc. Also seems like there's another adventurer party here... Bartender is a gnomish woman.

Adventuring party: dwarf man, human man, halfling female, elf female... Can't wait for this.

Anyway, the barwoman says that maybe a patron saw him a couple months ago? We get rooms food drinks and all that shit.

The other adventuring party 'killed a white dragon' for sure, no cap. They don't even have a name, fucking lame.

We eat and drink etc etc, and decide we're gonna try and get some more info. First stop the Trickdown Mage Academy, which is in the emerald eye area. We get stopped by guards on our way there, but we good. The receptionist there is a complete fucking dick on a stick. So fuck the Mage Academy.

Mozzi does a steal, and doesn't get caught... luckily...

Aaaaaanyway, next stop is the Mayor's office! There's a conversation that some people are having, but I can't really hear what it's about. Eventually the office door opens, and a few very posh people come out. Dwarf, posh boi who turns up his nose. Another Dwarf (Lovid), who looks fucking done. A female human who has a librarian-esque appearance. Finally, a female drawf who moves with purpose.

She enjoys our card, and our intro but her back gets up when we say that we're here for inquisitorial business.
Gretin Ironslag, is the mayor! She seems a bit more chill when we explain our selves a bit more. But doesn't seem to know much about the beaky boi.

Rollock Zaks, is the captain of the guard here. Apparently they have a little black market problem, but doesn't know too much about the special healing potions. So we might be able to help out with that.

But other than that the mayor seems actually pretty chill, and willing to help us! Sick. But doesn't know much information.

ITS SUN SANCTUARY TIME BABBBYYYY

Female Gnome behind the altar, blond hair, praying. Livolla. We have a kind of strange conversation, but she doesn't seem to know a lot. Also this temple, for being called the Sun Sanctuary is a little bit shit.

Nym and Tarryn also goes and prays at the temple of Corellon... I stay outside...

FIN

notes.title: Session 21
notes.text:
We're back baby.

Time to go find the guard captain! We find him in the Coldwalk district. He a grey haired, braided, serious dwarfy man. Looks like he's fucking done with erryting

Captain Zaks is too old for this shit. But he does kind of want us to find a group or man called The Obsidian? They wear black masks........

But the eye masks instead of the mouth. Saved.

We're gonna find these mother fuckers

No Hard Evidence but here are the names:

Treadorn Lightfoot  - Halfling Bard - Plays at Mountain Respite. (Coldwalk district)

Ullovon Desolant - Halfelf - Works in Cure Moderate Meats.

Dulva Steelgrate - Dwarf - Volunteers at Trade District temple of Moradin.

Verkis Jenkz - Gnome Wizard - Studies at Trickdown Magic Academy.

Potentially these peeps have something to do with the black market, so therefore might know more information where the beaky is, or something about his potions...


We decide to split into two teams, Team Clean, comprised of me and Nym, and Team Dirty. We're staggering our visit to the Mountain Respite, so that Team Dirty can try and get in with the halfling bard.

I ask Nym some questions about what the drow captain said to him, potential danger in the Underdark incoming? But Nym doesn't want to speak about it until we're in super private. We follow after shortly.

Team Dirty join the rowdy setting of the Mountain Respite.

Ok I forgot to write notes but a fucking shit tonne happened...

Team Dirty, noticed the bard was doing some cool music playing, but also flipping around and stealing peoples stuff. Pretty cool. Until he does it to Mozzi. Not cool.
Tarryn makes a distraction after the performance is over and Mozzi follows him up the stairs doing his best ring girl impression. It does not go to plan. The bard gives him a cheeky smirk so you know he's a baddie.

Plan starts off with Team Dirty staying here, and maybe speaking to the bard in the morning? Buuuuuuuuttt... Mirrin starts shouting extreme danger at Nym.

Sounds outside of people being gutted, and meniacal laughter...

Hey yo, remember when I spoke to Nym about if anything he spoke about was potentially a threat to us?
YEAH, YEAH....
Nym's brother has arrived.

Khaine - Nym's brother? Full Drow. Looking proper evil. Nicknamed The Kinslayer...

Umbris - Nym's Sister, Nicknamed the Invisible blade

Vilna - Nym's Sister? She's the calm one question? Maybe. She's named the Reign of Arrows

Combat.

Holy shit Mozzi and Otto fucked up Khaine and Umbris big time. They're both ending this fight without heads. As Nym coup de grace Khaine, he screams out in pain searing from his back and has a strange purply light coming from below his armour? The fuck? Also he picks up Khaine's dark black scary sword that definitely doesn't talk to him. But he's screaming in pain continuously.

We dispatch with the rest of the Drow, mostly except for Vilna who runs away big time. This isn't gonna come back and bite us in the future.

Nym's dead siblings kind of turn into dust and kind of get swallowed by Nym?! Uhhhhhhh

FIN

notes.title: Session 22
notes.text:
Ok so shits all fucked up.
The Guard captain eventually arrives, and gives us a massive dressing down. For some reason, still trying to figure that out.

He tells us to not leave the city and go away. Basically breaks us

Nyms father was captured by drow raiders a long time ago. Was a great swordsman. Was also a slave. Mother was a discraced priestess of Lolth. She sucks. She reaaaalllllyy sucks. Pitting her children against each other? Hence crazy siblings. Father, Nym and his sister, tried to get sprung out. 5 siblings remain...

The Reverent Matriatch (Nym's mother), has put out a motherfucking 100,000GP bounty on his head........... What the actual fuck.

We all spill our guts about our back stories.
Tarryn has been to the underdark once to try and save some people.
Otto has no idea about what happened on the air ship. His adopted parents are dead, and his village was burned down by a baron.
Nym, see above. Holy shit.
Mozzi found another gem in the sewers in Kessen back in the day and that what powers Lodo, and what the rats are after.

I'm fine by the way.
Time to sleep...

SIKE MOTHERFUCKER.

Fucking Vilna is back and she's literally sniper wolf. Attacks Nym who I'm sharing a room with, and he almost gets one banged. Then I almost get one banged and we charge out to face her... Naked and afraid. Not good. Otto see's her briefly, but she's very stealthy bitch.

Mozzi goes up on the rooftops and its very MGS. She runs, we chase etc etc.
At last we find her, scaling a building. Very fortunate I get off a blindness spell, which is fucking permanent in this edition? Hello.
At that point she's pretty much defeated. Time for Nym to do his thing. She looks like she's giving up, but they're speaking in undercommon, so I have no idea what the fuck is going on.
She tries one last attempt to get a boot dagger, but no dice. Nym gets his coup de grace.

notes.title: Session 23
notes.text:
We baaaaaaaaaaack. It's been a while.

Ok so Nym swallows up a third sibling and takes her skull and bones... Cooooool...

We head back to the Ale of the Banshee, and the owner is a bit confused about the fucked up door and windows. Yeah, our bad, but money resolves all problems. I take my diva grouchy ass self to bed and rest.

We loot Viylna!
She has:

Quicksilver Boots - Goes to Otto.

Gloves of Dex + 4 - Nym

Leather + 3 - Mozzi

Ring of Entropic Deflection - ME! I now have 50% chance to be missed when targetted by ranged attacks.

Longbow +1 with an energy crystal. - Nym

Shopping is going terrbily. There's a tax on buying magic items? It's a fucking nightmare. I just wanna buy my shit... Lots of Tax Shouting happens

I try to go to an enchanter to get Calling on my armour... Success!! 2000gold down, but I will have Calling armour in 2 days!

In the mean time I wear Leather + 2 as a hand me down.

We split into two. Tarryn and Nym are dressing up to try and find someone in the black market business by looking for illicit goods.
Me Mozzi and Otto are gonna go to the airship docks to try and see if they've seen anyone with the beaky boiz description

Me and Otto find fuck all, however Mozzi speaks to some mice nearby who have spotted Beaky boi!!! He was spotted putting some shit on an airship once upon a time. A lead?

Tarryn and Nym do there deception stuff, and they're meeting up with a dodgy dealer female dwarf (named Steelgrate?) with a symbol that Nym might recognise? The safehouse is the fucking temple of Moradin...

The Silver Chimes, The Obsidian. What the fuck this plan is worrrrrrkkkiinnnnnggggg. No one expects the temples...

We have a plan. Its fucking shit. We'll do it live

Tarryn and Otto are gonna do the dirty 8 grand deal for Tranquil, Whisky and guns.
Mozzi is gonna try and teleport in to the temple, and steal a fucking load of money.
Nym and Me hide on a temple roof in case shit goes down. If it does, Nym lights it up, and I send a message to the Guard Captain.

Operation Cannot Possibly Fail

Uhhhhhhh, wait. Operation can fail. Steelgrate says that the deal is off. Apparently the Obsidian got spooked...

And then Tarryn and Otto go into an alleyway... and theres some dark figures.

And then Me and Nym on the roof see some dark figures on other roofs...

Fuck.

Remember for next session: I'm not wearing my normal armour and I have weird ring of 50% ranged dodge. Also Mozzi has Tarryns transolcation anklet. And Mirryn has booties

notes.title: Session 24
notes.text:
Get well soon Luke. Dialing in from OUTER SPACE!!!

Combat board is amazing looking. But fuucccckkk ok lets do it.

Getting stressed in this fight....

RIght this combat has been fucking stressful, but here are the highlights:

- Tarryn and Otto in their murder corrdior. Otto does otto things, Tarryn almost gets flanked but convinces the two baddies to attack each other and runs.
Otto gets hit by a feeblemind. Not fucking good. He dddduuummmbbb.... They start trying to arrive to our fight, but it's gonna take a while.

- The other fight... Yeah we're not doing so hot. Mozzi almost fucking dies, 2 failed death saving throws. Fuck. Still playing it out, but Mozzi got hit by a paralysis and hasn't been able to resist... Me and Nym almost fucking die to.
However! When Nym kills the mage, they start to fucking run awayyyyy. Shwweeeeeeetttt.

Ok it's all fucked. We take refuge in the temple of Pelor where we stood upon for most of the fight. The party comes back together. We know that we've got nothing we can do to help Otto right now. Bad times...

Amulet of Natural armour

Braces of armour + 2

6 * +1 crossbow

6 * leather + 3

6* +1 dagger

The sorceress has another item... A scrying beacon. This is a banned item.

I'm gonna start asking questions to the dead sorceress:

Where is the obsidian based in this city. - Many bases.

Is the beak faced man in this city right now. - No.

Where is the black market? - Next door (temple of moradin)

Who sent you to kill us? - Ophelia. Leader of the commerce guild...

We run into the Moradin temple to start trying to search around, but there is fucking nothing in here.

notes.title: Session 25
notes.text:
My notes got deleted for this session :(

Basically, we decide to chase Ophelia in the commerce guild tower.

We get Otto nice and healed up, we charge in,

She should be on the top floor. It's fucking mental trapped. We end up in a maze with Gorgons, metal bulls and shit.

We eventually escape. The final room has a super mega fire explosion. We almost get tpk'd... But it's all gravy

notes.title: Session 26
notes.text:
Hopefully no more seshy deleteys this time.
We're just about alive in this stupid commerce guild tower... We're trying to do map completion, but also weary that we could fucking die big time, and I'm tapped.

We think about trying to go through some more doors and shit up here but fuck that off fairly quicky.
We head down stairs, the drones at level 4 are still droning on. Looks like they're writing weird flow charts or something to try and prepare for something. Weirdchamp.

They also have these flow charts that talk about upcoming attacks potentially on Kessen and Mawsgate... Hmmm...

Level 3, prison is empty now. Not much there

Level 2. Empty, but the orb... it's so tempting. Nym yolo touches it. He gets a crazy vision, white cliffs, black pyramid, boat graveyard? We all sort of see it, but no one knows where it is.
Then we go for a group check on it. That's when we see a dark omen. Mawsgate is under attack, complete chaos and death running through the streets. Very cold. Chanting in draconic, 'Vengeance'. It could be a white dragon attack as revenge for that shitty little other party that says they killed a white dragon... might have been a baby... Fuck.

We head back towards the captains quarters, and there's so many people there getting ready for processing. Fucking paperwork

We start questioning a guy called Lovid, he might know some shit. He starts making deals to try and get his wife and son safe, fuck that shit we're gonna interview his son because he's deffo involved in all the bad shit. Kid's name is Oslo.

Oslo is a fuccccccckkiiinnnnggggggg ppprrrriiiiiiccccccckkkkkkkk.

He's such a fucking noble douche rocket, he thinks he's top shit. He probably knows shit but he doesn't reveal much. Also he a little raaacciisstt.

This isn't getting far, not sure what the play is. But we think maybe the best thing is to find Lovid's wife, Oslo's mother, because she's a little sussy baka as well. Maybe we can use her as leverage.

We come to the conclusion after doing a little searchy search that the Obsidian definitely have the wife/mother.

Oh my god Tarryn fucking figured it out. The kid doesnt know shit, the Obsidian have kidnapped her and Oslo thought. We have to save her basically. The kid says that sometimes the dad smelt like meat? Cure Moderate Meats is the next stop for shure.

I've bought a Font for scrying for next session to try and locate her, because WE FUCKING LEVEL UP BBAABBBBYYYYYYYY!!!!!!

I also message Nathaniel, who says my armour will be ready at around noon tomorrow. I can try to get it a bit earlier. The command word is ZENITH

notes.title: Session 27
notes.text:
Happy birthday to me!!!!! Dnd on bevvies!!

Ok I try and get the annoying kid to give me something of his mothers. He does. I do the scrying thing. It feels like it connects, and immediately gets cut off. Something is blocking me out for sure. Annnoooyyyyiiinnngggg....

Anyyywaaayyy...  we decide fuck it we're gonna try to get to Cure Moderate Meats via the sewers. It goes fucking terribly. They know we're coming and there are many many traps. Including one that turns Otto to stone. Quick detour to grab a Stone to Flesh scroll, and he's back in action, but they're still fucking with us with their pre cognition. It's real bad news.

Eventually, we find the underpassage to Cure Moderate Meats. Mozzi and Nym go up first, thrown up by Otto. Then Otto throws me, and I spend my epic point to get my armour at the peak. It's a proper anime moment.

Light from the armour allows a bit of vision in the room now. We see what we assume is Beatice in a cage, looking close to death maybes. There's also a guy who just opened the door and have seen us... We roll initiative, but we'll see what happens..
This poor peasant man, gets commanded, grappled, gagged and tied... But we also find boxes FULL of contriband shit. Potions, illegal magic items etc. This is potentially the mega base!

It's fucking time. Mozzi tries to pick the lock to the cage, natty 1. An alarm goes off and we're fucking going for it.

Alright its fucking fight time, it's kind of like a chess game, trying to dodge the necklaces of fireballs everywhere. Some serious big time work done by Nym and Otto to be fair. Phantasmal Killer plus a crazy head shot with the heavy crossbow. People getting fucked up...

And then Opehelia appears and tries to get us to Halt. It literally didnt work against anyone. Lolsies...

But then... THE BEAKY BOI STABS BEATICE... and then throws a giant sphere of pain with tenticles or something? Uh oh. Game end!

notes.title: Session 28
notes.text:
Fuck. We're just getting straight in there.... This is gonna be real bad.
Straight up beaky just throws some aoe rage on the boys, and then the tenticle ball explodes into some kind of complete fucking mess monster.

Ok shit got real.

- There are lots of tenticly boys, and one large boi. They really fucking hurt.

- The beaky is stuck in a cage for most of the time. He can't do fuck all, but he pretty much bounces out as soon as he can.

- Ophelia is sort of helping, but when shit turns shower she makes a big stone wall. Tarryn gives chase, teleporting over. And she fucking 1 taps him. He dedge. Big time.

Ok we need to act fast. 9 days remaining before he dedge for life. Unless I gentle repose which I just wasted on a stupid dwarf bitch with a shit name. We GTFO of the meat plant. Otto is weak from poison.

Alright. Fuck. Fuck. Fuck. Fuck.
We need to bring him back to life goddamn it. Fuck.

We gather up the diamonds that we need, it costs extra but dilligaf.

Temple of Pelor time. We're setting up trying to bring him back. Gonna need to happen tomorrow though. I'm gonna need some sort of epic speech to bring him back...

"Pelor, I call upon you as your humble servant. Our friend and comrade Tarryn has been taken from this world before his time. He has a kind soul, and has spent his life in dedication to helping the weak, and in the injustices that he has found. The people of this world still need him. Tarryn, we need you.

The boys go for a memorial rager, because you know that's what Tarryn would have wanted.

Alright it's time...
Lets see how it goes.

We all have to give up something, or prepare something.
Otto gives up his glave. Nym gives up some spell slots. Mozzi gives up his ability to hide his arms. I try to give up my religious diplomacy, but instead I have to roll a last diplomacy check.

The roll ends up being DC 30. +9, +12 for all of the things we give up.

Natural 20 baby.


End

notes.title: Session 29
notes.text:
We back bitches. Tarryn is alive -1 level

We don't have a plan... but we'll start.

First stop is we're gonna go back to the commerce guild building. And we're going to try using the same scrying table from before to see some shit. We try to scry on Ophelia again. Denied. Bitch.
We try scrying on the white dragon. No dice.

We try again, not sure this time. Field with a starless sky... It's the fucking scarecrow... What have we spawned

Next stop. - Back to the statue of Helio.

Medusa is in ancient city to the south named Sardus?

I do a little divination spell and as if it's Pelor's will that we go to Sardus to slay the medusa. He says:

"Sometimes the darkest path reveal the brightest sun. Share my shame."

Cryptic as ever.

We try a little trip to visit the two dwarf bois. It's not a goer.

We interrogate the burrito man that we made. He was just a worker at cure moderate meats, until the baddies turned up and took it over, he was kind of forced to stay and work for them. However he does link the Obsidian and Ophelia and all that shit to the Freedom fighter people who terroristed. Which means that they were supplying more necklaces of fireballs and potions etc etc.

Sleepy sleep time. I have a mini dream that I don't really remember "Please, release me".

In the morning, we head to the temple of Pelor, and high priestess Neccos is there? Confirming a miracle? Who me?

She reaffirms her belief that ressurection is scary, and should be used in moderation or Pelor might get angry. Fair enough. Also kind of reaffirms that going to kill the Medusa would be a good idea?

Messaged Lydia. She's alive! and replies. But she a little dumb dumb.

Ophelia - Sending:

Ophelia, enemy of my enemy is my friend. Would like to discuss beak. Truce. Because we will finish him. Neutral ground, tomorrow. If not we hunt you.

Hunt away, you will end up like your friend. I recommend you speak to the mayor, we have something in progress.


We head to mayor. She hands up a paper, terms of surrender. She wants amnesty for her and followers, and severance for 2 years... To discuss next sesh! End

notes.title: Session 30
notes.text: I can't replicate the bug but all my notes are gone.

notes.title: Session 31
notes.text:
RIGGGHHHHTTTTTTT....

Tarryn is single player right now. His mates are there and he fucks off! Darian Smith is BAAAALLLD!! FUCKING BALD NO HAIR PUSSY BALD. BALD. BALD. BALD.

Alby (not the racist dragon), he's a dwarf, who's BEARDLESS!?!?!?!?!?! and thin. Braids, is a female golaith, who is basically Barrett but it's a blade. Sick.

He meets with his 'friends', and has a little chat. I wasn't there. what do I know?

Recap over. It's time to fuck with Tarryn hardstyle. He get's scarecrowed. You know how it do.

We deal with that whole scenario, try some tracking to find it but no good.

SYKE! He fucks with him agaiiiiiiinnnnn!!!

This time he's out... maybe... See in 10 weeks or so...

-----------

WE HAVE A SPA DAY. ALRIGHT ALRIGHT ALRIGHT.

Then we kind of chill so that these guys can meet Hurbadurby Dur who's name I can't say, the noble who wants to make us suckle for cash. We meet him, he offers us up to 50G's each per month. Ridiculous, but we still say no. Fuck that...

notes.title: Session 32
notes.text:
SCRY is over!! We know those fuckers are on an airship to Kessen now, but what do we do about it?

We go visit the Mayor, she's so bored of us by now. We tell her about the imminent 9/11, but she doesn't like it because we scryed. Fucking commie.

Alright so we decide its Medusa time. We buy just a bunch of provisions and shit, and just begin our YOLO journey. We head south, days travel. At night time, Tarryn and Otto are on watch when a loud noise happens, sort of back the way we came? Ru ro shaggy.

Sent a message to our daddy, he was super unhappy about that. He heard the roar too. No worries then, lets go to Sardus!
We arrive, at sort of night time, and it's like a ruined greek necropolisy like feel. Looks cool... to bad it's gonna be fucking cursed.

We get a nice relaxing night sleep, and there's a female cackiling in the night... Excellent. Let's go fuck this bitch.

I roll a -8 stealth check, not the worst.

We travel up the many levels of the ruined city. Eventually after a few hours we come across some statues... of all races size times etc. We think about maybe freeing one for bants, but carry on.

We've scaled like 5 levels of this city now, and the statues are becoming more frequent. Shit's getting real fam.

MOZZI FUCKING LOOKS AT HER. Not his fault, he does a little double take and she's fucking there. Luckily he resists the petrification, holy. So anyway he stated blasting...

WE IN THE FIGHT BOIS. There's a lot of terrain up in here, and she's fucking terrifying. Confirmed elf!? Maybe? I try my blindness yolo hope. It fails big time.

ADDS ARE COMINGGGGGG. They pretty much suck cock. But annyoing...

notes.title: Session 33
notes.text:
OHHHHH FUCCKK

We're in combat boiz. She runs up and tries to stare at me. Eyes closed hands out like a blind hooker.

I heal Otto, but it gets basically nullified by a Medusa shot immediately.

NYM YOU FUCKING HEEEEERRRROOOOOOOOOOOO! Rolls a crit and drains of her of 14 Strength. Holy shit he fucking did, he sucked her dry.

And then Otto deals the death blow.

Nym gives me a simple looking bronze amulet, a unicorn, symbol of Ehlona possibly. It's not magical.

There are 7 temples in a kind of circle over the bridge, with a number of deities. The center and biggest dick one is Pelor, for sure for sure. We take the body and head and shit over to the temple area.

We enter in the ruined Temple of Pelor...

It's an older style of temple, but it does have some kind of like sacrificial altar for old school offerings and shit. We put the body of Medusa on it...
Meanwhiiiillle. Nym finds a secret door at the back of the room, and goes through into a dirt tunnel or something, I don't know I was getting a drink.

It looks like Nym find the resting place of the actual Helio? We find his skeleton, and shit like that. There's a note carved the in the wall, possibly from Medusa saying that she loves him like the sun or something. Shit.

Eventually we decide to lay Medusa and Helio to rest in that tomb and do burial rites etc.
We search the other temples, don't really find too much EXCEPT. There is a FUCKING MASSIVE GREATAXE in the temple of Kord, Flaming and Berserking. Holy Otto weapon. We take that shit.

There's a Palace Nightclub which we try and enter but the harpies dont like us. Fucking classic Palace. Otto takes a bit of a tumble, but it's not fatal and we bounce.

We do a little break enchantment on a human we try as a tester. It works but she's already dead like the soul had given up. Bad times.

We rest up and travel back to Mawsgate which is uneventfull.

I got fucking betrayed... FML...

As we pour the blood on the statue, it turns into some sort of moon bitch, and there's a satyr which was the old man who was the historian. I am rage.

She almost 1 shots me, I don't have armour on because I thought this would be fine. I think I'm probably deadge here, also I have 4 negative levels so I'm turbo fucko'd. SYKE I have 8 negative levels instead. So I'm level 1, and down with 0 death saves currently... 1 SUCCESS!
And thats the session end.

notes.title: Session 34
notes.text:
I DIED


A new challenger approaches...

notes.title: Session 35
notes.text:
Lol all notes gone again Fuck sake. 

We're going into a seige. It's all going very fast...

notes.text:
49 COLD RESIST REMAINING
SAJA HP - 53 / 60

Siege begins. Turns out stone spikes is very very good. Lots of AoE shit goes down including necklace of fireballs. We kill the first wave fairly quickly but they're coming in hot.

gear.name: Collar of Healing (Companion)
gear.properties:
This collar allows you to heal your trusted
animal friend at a moment’s notice. A
collar of healing functions only when worn
by your animal companion, familiar, or
special mount. While that creature wears
the collar, you always know its exact hit
point total. This is a continuous effect and
requires no activation.

In addition, you can activate the collar
from any distance (as long as you are on
the same plane) to cure the animal wearing it. This instantly heals the creature wearing the collar of 50 points of damage
and removes the fatigued or exhausted
condition (if the creature currently suffers from such). This ability functions once per day.

specialAbilities.name: Nature Sense
specialAbilities.description: A druid gains a +2 bonus on Knowledge (nature) and Survival checks.

specialAbilities.name: Wild Empathy
specialAbilities.description:
A druid can improve the attitude of an animal. This ability functions just like a Diplomacy check made to improve the attitude of a person. The druid rolls 1d20 and adds her druid level and her Charisma modifier to determine the wild empathy check result.

The typical domestic animal has a starting attitude of indifferent, while wild animals are usually unfriendly.

To use wild empathy, the druid and the animal must be able to study each other, which means that they must be within 30 feet of one another under normal conditions. Generally, influencing an animal in this way takes 1 minute but, as with influencing people, it might take more or less time.

A druid can also use this ability to influence a magical beast with an Intelligence score of 1 or 2, but she takes a -4 penalty on the check.

specialAbilities.name: Woodland Stride
specialAbilities.description: Starting at 2nd level, a druid may move through any sort of undergrowth (such as natural thorns, briars, overgrown areas, and similar terrain) at her normal speed and without taking damage or suffering any other impairment. However, thorns, briars, and overgrown areas that have been magically manipulated to impede motion still affect her.

specialAbilities.name: Trackless Step
specialAbilities.description: Starting at 3rd level, a druid leaves no trail in natural surroundings and cannot be tracked. She may choose to leave a trail if so desired.

specialAbilities.name: Resist Nature's Lure
specialAbilities.description: Starting at 4th level, a druid gains a +4 bonus on saving throws against the spell-like abilities of fey.

specialAbilities.name: Venom Immunity
specialAbilities.description: At 9th level, a druid gains immunity to all poisons.

specialAbilities.name: Wild Shape
specialAbilities.description:
